title: 'Joker' star Marc Maron says debate over movie is 'trying to provoke something awful to happen'
text: 25for45: “This is what we do,” Mr Pompeo told reporters, when asked if other countries might be pressured by the president. “Nations work together, and the say ‘Boy, goodness gracious, if you can help me with ‘X,’ we’ll help you achieve ‘Y’. This is the "spin" that they do. They commit some egregious act that claim it is "normal". trump asked China to investigate Biden "in public" to deflate the fact that he did it on a phone call then tried to cover it up. And then this claim. Well guess what boys, this is NOT how we roll. Agree we ask countries to help us and we will help them. But not in our elections, not doing opposition research on our opponents. Nice try, some of us are paying attention anyway.
description: Joker actor Marc Maron says movies can't be blamed for real-life violence and the focus on the psychological comic book drama has led to people fearing potential incidents in movie theaters.
